item.title: Common Pitfalls of Event Sourcing
item.description: Event Sourcing defines a different way to represent state of the data in a domain. Instead of maintaining the latest state of a single domain object in the database (CRUD), Event Sourcing promotes storing a full history of event logs which can be played sequentially to construct the current or past state of a domain object. I started working with Event Sourcing over 5 years ago. Many lessons were learned along the journey.
